name: ListUserEvents
description:
Fetches a list of user-generated events on Vercel.

This tool retrieves events generated by user actions on Vercel, such as logging in, creating deployments, or joining teams. If a `teamId` is provided, events related to that specific team are returned.

parameters.name: maximum_items_to_return
parameters.description: Maximum number of items that can be returned from the request.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of items which may be returned.

parameters.name: include_items_since_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp to only include items created since then. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Timestamp to only include items created since then.

parameters.name: end_time_filter
parameters.description: Timestamp to filter events created until this time.

value_schema.description: Timestamp to only include items created until then.

parameters.name: event_types_filter
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of event types to filter the results by.

value_schema.description: Comma-delimited list of event \"types\" to filter the results by.

parameters.name: deprecated_user_id
parameters.description: Deprecated. Use 'principal_id' instead. If both 'principal_id' and 'deprecated_user_id' exist, 'principal_id' will be used.

value_schema.description: Deprecated. Use `principalId` instead. If `principalId` and `userId` both exist, `principalId` will be used.

parameters.name: filter_by_principal_id
parameters.description: Filter events generated by a specific principal when retrieving events for a Team.

value_schema.description: When retrieving events for a Team, the `principalId` parameter may be specified to filter events generated by a specific principal.

parameters.name: project_ids_filter
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of project IDs to filter the events by.

value_schema.description: Comma-delimited list of project IDs to filter the results by.

parameters.name: include_event_payload
parameters.description: Set to 'true' to include the 'payload' field in each event response.

value_schema.description: When set to `true`, the response will include the `payload` field for each event.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: Specify the Team ID to retrieve events related to that team.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of. Use this to specify which team's events to retrieve.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items which may be returned.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of items which may be returned.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Timestamp to only include items created since then.

value_schema.description: Timestamp to only include items created since then.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Timestamp to only include items created until then.

value_schema.description: Timestamp to only include items created until then.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of event \"types\" to filter the results by.

value_schema.description: Comma-delimited list of event \"types\" to filter the results by.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Deprecated. Use `principalId` instead. If `principalId` and `userId` both exist, `principalId` will be used.

value_schema.description: Deprecated. Use `principalId` instead. If `principalId` and `userId` both exist, `principalId` will be used.

parameters.name: principalId
parameters.description: When retrieving events for a Team, the `principalId` parameter may be specified to filter events generated by a specific principal.

value_schema.description: When retrieving events for a Team, the `principalId` parameter may be specified to filter events generated by a specific principal.

parameters.name: projectIds
parameters.description: Comma-delimited list of project IDs to filter the results by.

value_schema.description: Comma-delimited list of project IDs to filter the results by.

parameters.name: withPayload
parameters.description: When set to `true`, the response will include the `payload` field for each event.

value_schema.description: When set to `true`, the response will include the `payload` field for each event.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.
